name: JSON Search, Other Utilities
short_description:
This is a collection of lightweight utility classes. Most of the classes in this package are standalone files without dependencies on other classes inside or outside of this package. Some classes are more procedural than others in the sense that they are simply collections of static methods. Some classes are meant to enforce certain design patterns.

This is an ongoing project.

Java documentation is available on project website: http://jsonjavasearchmore.sourceforge.net
summary: Lightweight utility classes that complement the standard libraries.
